editor.label: Application Server - IIS6 ResetServer
editor.description: This procedure uses the iisreset utility to reset a server.

formElement.label: Configuration name:
formElement.documentation: Provide the name of the configuration that holds connection information for the IIS server.

formElement.label: Absolute path of the script utility:
formElement.documentation: Provide the absolute path of the script utility used to execute this step (for example: iisreset or c:/windows/system32/iisreset.exe).
